entry.title: Designing for Long-Form Articles
entry.summary: Designing a beautiful ‚Äúarticle‚Äù is wrought with tons of considerations. Unlike, say, a homepage, a long-form article is less about designing an interface than it is designing text in a way that creates a relaxed and comfortable reading experience. entry.title: Fluid Sizing Instead Of Multiple Media Queries?
entry.summary: If you like math and CSS, you‚Äôll love this one. We don‚Äôt need to use media queries to change the values of some CSS properties ‚Äî *font-size*, *padding*, *margin* etc. ‚Äî depending on the viewport width, with the CSS `clamp` function. But: we still need to use media queries for changing colors, borders, shadows and other CSS styles.
